## CustomScrollbar class

Wraps component into <Scrollbars> component from `react-custom-scrollbars`

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare class CustomScrollbar extends Component<Props> 
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { CustomScrollbar } from '@grafana/ui';
```
